TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ItemCheckEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供資料給事件的和控制項。

span.span: Provides data for the event of the and controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 核取的狀態的核取的清單方塊中的項目變更時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when the checked state of an item in a checked list box changes. 類別會指定要變更]、 [項目，核取方塊的目前值和 [設定] 核取方塊的新值之項目的索引。The class specifies the index of the item to change, the current value of the check box for the item, and the new value to set for the check box. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何檢查處理控制項事件。The following code example demonstrates a checked control that handles the event. 此方法會使用並的屬性物件擷取和計算選取功能表項目的價格。The method uses the and properties of the object to retrieve and tally the price of the menu items selected. 若要在表單，其中包含執行此範例中貼上下列程式碼名為`ListView1`並名為`Textbox1`。To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a named `ListView1` and a named `Textbox1`. 呼叫`InitializeListView`從表單的建構函式的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. 請確定其事件處理方法相關聯的所有事件。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您判斷指定的項目中的核取狀態之前檢查狀態套用變更。This property enables you to determine the check state of the specified item in the before the check state change to apply is made. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何檢查處理控制項事件。The following code example demonstrates a checked control that handles the event. 此方法會使用並的屬性物件擷取和計算選取功能表項目的價格。The method uses the and properties of the object to retrieve and tally the price of the menu items selected. 若要在表單，其中包含執行此範例中貼上下列程式碼名為`ListView1`並名為`Textbox1`。To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a named `ListView1` and a named `Textbox1`. 呼叫`InitializeListView`從表單的建構函式的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. 請確定其事件處理方法相關聯的所有事件。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷哪一個項目中的核取方塊正在變更。You can use this property to determine which item's check box in the is being changed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何檢查處理控制項事件。The following code example demonstrates a checked control that handles the event. 此方法會使用並的屬性物件擷取和計算選取功能表項目的價格。The method uses the and properties of the object to retrieve and tally the price of the menu items selected. 若要在表單，其中包含執行此範例中貼上下列程式碼名為`ListView1`並名為`Textbox1`。To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a named `ListView1` and a named `Textbox1`. 呼叫`InitializeListView`從表單的建構函式的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. 請確定其事件處理方法相關聯的所有事件。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出項目的核取方塊要設定為已核取、未核取或是不定。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to set the check box for the item to be checked, unchecked, or indeterminate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您判斷所指定項目的新的核取狀態的核取狀態變更之前控制項。This property enables you to determine the new check state for the specified item before the check state is changed by the control. 除了判斷新的核取狀態，您可以使用這個屬性中的事件處理常式事件，以將狀態變更為高於指定不同的核取狀態。In addition to determining the new check state, you can use this property in an event handler for the event to change the state to a different check state than the one specified. 例如，如果使用者放置項目旁邊的核取記號您已決定應該不會檢查根據您的應用程式的狀態，您可以覆寫核取記號狀態變更此屬性設定為其先前的設定或 to 為不同的核取狀態。For example, if the user placed a check mark next to an item in the that you have determined should not be checked based on the state of your application, you can override the change in the check mark state by setting this property to its previous setting or to a different check state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`CheckedListBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `CheckedListBox1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#156](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#156)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#156](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#156)]
